sense.def:
One's arrival at a place
je prihod nekoga nekam.

seg.quote: I apologise for my late arrival.

sense.def:
The arrival of something new
pomeni, da je nekaj novega začelo obstajati ali se dogajati.

seg.quote: Industry has been revolutionized by the arrival of the computer.

sense.def:
The arrival of a baby
je rojstvo dojenčka.

An arrival
je človek, ki je pravkar nekam prišel.

seg.quote: One of the new arrivals at the college was an old friend.
